website_summaries.verdict: High-quality massage tool made of 100% jade, designed from a 2,000-year-old mold.
pros: Long-lasting and super easy to clean
Due to the ultra smooth surface, it will never hurt your skin
Ideal for working on the neck, face, back, and feet
70-page instructional ebook is provided as well
cons: Although advertised as jade, several users reported color varies and quality might be compromised

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool, but questionable durability
customer_reviews.text: First off, let me just say that this tool really is as amazing as people say. It was so easy to stick with everyday because the grooves in this tool fit perfectly into the contours of your face and it makes the process feel like Heaven. I really love it. However, I had to give it 3 stars because it broke a few months in. I went to contour my jaw and one of the edges broke in half. Not sure what that means about it's quality :(
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Botox!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical at first, but after using this for a few weeks, I have noticed that my jawline looks more prominent and the skin around my nose and mouth appear tighter. My frowny lines around my mouth, for which I used to get Botox, are softening, and my resting Bitch face is a thing of the past!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Feel good.
customer_reviews.text: I watched some videos to educate me on how to use this. I use it every morning witha a little facial oil. I will post an updated review after using it for 6 months. But, after scraping my face it feels tingly in good way and my skin gets red. The redness goes away after I’m done. I wash the scraper with soap and water after and store it back in the bag it came with. I’m pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: This piece of jade is of nice quality! It was easy to order
customer_reviews.text: This piece of jade is of nice quality! It was easy to order, shipping was fast and came wrapped in a small box with inner padding! I used cocounut oil (for skin) and hen used the product on my skin. Honestly I am shocked that it actually gives my skin a nice glow! It's not just the oil - I believe it is the jade scraper that stimulates the blood cells! So far very happy and it was not expensive at all!
customer_reviews.author: D3ruthie

customer_reviews.title: When you use it-it works
customer_reviews.text: When you actually use it every night you will see a difference. Kinda hard to believe, but its true. I’d post pics but lol I haven’t used it for a while and yeah I’d rather not 😭 sorry peeps-oh it’s a thick stone not some flimsy stone. But this isn’t snake oil, it does actually work-just look up the Right techniques (you do not want to use this thing wrong) but it’s niceeee! And you can also use it on your neck, shoulders🤤, hands, legs whateve (and yeah drool face for shoulders because it feels amazing)
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: This feels great, it exercises the facial muscles.
customer_reviews.text: I am new to this as of two weeks ago, so I have not seen results, however I highly recommend that you check out on YouTube how to use this tool. It is best to follow someone who is educated in using this the correct way. This feels good, move slowly, I am using this twice a day. I believe that your face should be exercised as the other muscles in the body. Please remember to use a moisturizer or light facial oil as directed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mang

customer_reviews.title: ... chip on one of the long sides- so I’m pretty much unable to use that side at all
customer_reviews.text: *Updated- they replied in less than a day with an apology and reordered it for me, without me having to do any form filling, calls, etc. So- great service. And I received the replacement and it’s perfect. The quality of the item is really good, and I’ve been enjoying using it and do see differences in my skin! Arrived with a sizable chip on one of the long sides- so I’m pretty much unable to use that side at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool when used as a daily part of your beautifying regimen will do wonders to your face. Even when I sporadically use the Gua Sha, I can see obvious differences in my skin. My face is firmer around the jawline, wrinkles are decreased between my brows, and laugh lines are less shallow. So can you imagine the wonders it will do if you use it every single day, twice a day. Give the Gua Sha a try!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Self Massager that works !
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this massager by my masseuse. I was having a really bad temporal headache and this product arrived in the mail. On opening the package I was very skeptical about how the product would be helpful. I saw some you tube videos on how the product was to be used. I asked my husband to work my neck and shoulder muscle. I could not believe it but my headache was gone after a few minutes of use. I have been used it several times and it has been my go to tool for relieving painful and tight muscles . It is not a cure but definitely gives relief from pain!!
customer_reviews.author: Arti BK

customer_reviews.title: It feels a little thin
customer_reviews.text: I have a beautiful jade roller I love, so I wanted to try Gua Sha too. I know jade is not super uniform and there are all shades of it, but man, this is one super washed out green one, quite the opposite of the product picture in fact. Yes, I am aware the color does not mean it's less effective. That being said, it's not the smoothest and it feels quite thin on the hand. It does still get the work done, but it's just a little too textured.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Very effective for breaking up scar tissue
customer_reviews.text: Plantar fasciitis was a big problem for me until I found a chiropractor who performed Graston technique. Now that I've discovered this tool, I can treat myself whenever I feel my PF flaring up. It's been very effective and it saves me a trip to the chiro, not to mention the expense - this tool actually cost less than one copayment! The only drawback is that this is not for the faint of heart. You have to be willing to inflict some pain on yourself to get results.
customer_reviews.author: jcp

customer_reviews.title: Noticeably reduced my acne scars
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has struggled with acne scars for many years, this tool has been a godsend. Not only does it feel great when I use it on my face but in the 3 months that I have been using it daily, it has noticeably diminished and softened my acne scars. I usually scrape it along my face for 5-10 minutes each night after I've rubbed a natural oil serum into my skin. Great, high-quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best kept secret ...
customer_reviews.text: First learned about the gua sha scraping tool from my massage therapist when he used it to loosen muscles in my neck. His use of this implement definitely helped the degenerative arthritis in my neck. Decided to order one for my own use - it just arrived - so have only used it once. This implement really works well and has helped my arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Its white.
customer_reviews.text: I can use this tool but i was surprised that it was white (not green) and a little thinner than the picture appears. I will store with care so it doent break but im doubtful it is actually jade.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Massage tool
customer_reviews.text: It was suggested by my physiatrist (sports medicine doctor) to use the Gua Sha massage tool on sore muscles and my arthritic hip. The doctor is a world-class athlete who uses the tool himself, so when he recommended it, I decided to give it a try. So far, so good! The tool came quickly, and also included the website on which to download the 70-page therapy guide book describing all the places the tool can be used. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Michele B

customer_reviews.title: Mine was a little lighter in color but othewise looks like the pic
customer_reviews.text: about the size of an avg woman's palm. Being of natural substance the colors won't be even across all products. I don't know enough about stones to say if it is real jade but i wasn once told that if when held up to light it is uneven in grain "texture" its real jade. I did that and it was uneven. I use it with jojoba oil and it rinses well with warm water and a dry wash cloth to absorb the left over oil. Used it on my surgery scar and it helped some to break up the scar tissue.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and small
customer_reviews.text: This item fits in my small hands rather well. It is made of jade, not plastic that will scrape your skin. I ordered this rather than paying for Guasha. It works wonderfully to clear blockages. If you've never done this before, it IS painful so start off easy and work your way up.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great tool and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The gua sha can be used where there is sagging, tension, tightness, and soreness anywhere in face and body. Works great. Give it some time to see results. It can take one day, a few days or a few weeks to see results depending on the problem you have. We used it for plantar fasciitis, and got instant relief. With face sagging, it took a few days to see muscle tone improving. Also, great customer service. I had a complaint on the last one that I bought, but seller was very helpful and fix the problem. Product highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley C

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very easy to use and comfortable to hold. Very convenient that it comes with an insert with which you can download a free 79 page Gua Sha guidebook. I’ve used it on my face today and I can clearly see the difference. I cannot believe dept stores and brand names selling the same thing for 3x the price. Great tool for gua sha!
customer_reviews.author: Ludee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT massage tool
customer_reviews.text: I started using this for my face, and saw that I would get the same results as if I were to just massage my face with my hands and fingers, so I started using it on the back of my husband's leg. GREAT massage tool. Whenever he comes home from the gym, I put on some massage oils on his calves and massage the muscles to loosen then back up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool that everyone should have in medicine cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: This item should be stored in everyone's medicine cabinet, if you're active in sports/life! I developed tennis elbow, and have been using this to work out the knots/soreness, as I go thru therapy. This tiny tool really helps you work these sore muscles with ease (be sure to use some type of oil to help it slide along your injured body part to reduce friction). Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: TGriff

customer_reviews.title: Simple and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this simple tool. I waited a few days before reviewing it to ensure that I would want to use it and not get bored with it. It is well made, feels devine while using it and is easy to use. No batteries needed. They sent a e book for use and there are many YouTube videos unavailable. It has fit easily into my daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece of Jade!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this piece because I have always liked jade. It came quickly, and I must say, I am very impressed! This is not made of composite powder, it is an ACTUAL mini-slab of REAL JADE. It is beautiful, and larger than I expected. I have had a tight knot in my shoulder for years and years. I didn't expect this piece to get rid of it, but I used the jade on it today, and it relaxed it considerably. I am really, EXTREMELY HAPPY with this piece and HIGHLY RECOMMEND it to EVERYONE!
customer_reviews.author: boss44

customer_reviews.title: Can’t say for sure
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say for sure if this item made from jade or not. Because item received is milky white. Much whiter than most pale item shown on picture. And when you buying jade you expect it to be green at least a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my new beauty tool! It feels good and I think its helping my skin. I did watch a couple YouTube videos because you don't want to use the tool wrong. I clean it with alcohol prep pad wipes and put moisturizer or a serum on first to help the tool slide on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: You will thank yourself
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by the simple design. This tool has a lot of thought behind it The shape allows you to get around ankles, etc and it fits perfectly into your hand, making it easier to use. It's brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Gua Sha tool, just wish it was a bit bigger and heavier to assist smoothing out muscles. . As many others have said, the actual tool is not the bright jade green seen in the pictures, its more of a transparent lime green, but it still gets the work done.
customer_reviews.author: jv86

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful facial massage experience
customer_reviews.text: Glad I finally found this jade Gu Sha massage tool, which makes me feel refreshed after putting some facial oil. I always believe in massage improves circulations. And this is the right tool to help with me look radiant on face.
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Tool for Old Knees
customer_reviews.text: The tool is great - very useful on my knees. However, I am 70 years old, and flipping through the e-book on the computer is amusing - pretty much accomplishes very little. Give me a real book.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Please QC before sent out your merchandise
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pieces the same time. Different colors accepted. One is really thin ( both are same shape) 🧐 The surface not shining polish like new look like used😏 Not satisfied want to return but this is covid time don’t want to go out for any reason☹️☹️☹️ Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Healing
customer_reviews.text: I love my Gua Sha tools. I have two different kinds. I use these products for healing my body ailments. I’m a former dancer and this has been absolutely wonderful with providing me relief from body and muscle aches and pains.
customer_reviews.author: SatisfiedAmazoner

customer_reviews.title: So relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool! It's super high quality and durable and the curves are great for different areas of your face. I love that it's a little bit bigger so that you can get your whole hand on it to gut she your face.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: MAKES LIFE BETTER
customer_reviews.text: Got this to soothe the pain in my foot from plantar fascitis (which it does, very well) but was pleasantly surprised to learn from the book and youtube that I can use it all over for all kinds of pain and tightness. Am at a point where my husband and I gua sha each others back at the end of a hard day teaching kids. Awesome. Love these simple things that make life better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Little Product
customer_reviews.text: The product feels amazing on the face. I haven't used it for other purposes yet. I need to use it a few more times to give an accurate review, but in these initial days, it's a great product to use before bed. I have noticed my eyes don't seem as puffy when I wake up in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: SatisfiedAmazoner

customer_reviews.title: I love this tool
customer_reviews.text: The shape makes it very easy to use. The round edges make it easy to glide on your face. I use it for contouring my face or simply massaging; I love this item. I wish I bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: VCL

customer_reviews.title: WOW <3
customer_reviews.text: Got this because my boyfriend and I get neck and shoulder stress/tension- and wow this thing really surprised us! We love it! It feels amazing. It works your tense muscles deeper and harder than just fingers. You can rub this all over your body and it will be stress relieving and incredible :)
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Jade Gua Sha tool!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Gua Sha massage tool is a very nice size, smooth, slim yet sturdy. It is a great fit in your hand and I love that it is made out of beautiful jade. I would purchase again should I have a need. AAA+++Seller. I'm adding to my review, since I bought a second one as a gift. I love my jade gua sha massage tool, and I'm sure my friend will too.
customer_reviews.author: pup24pup

customer_reviews.title: Oops
customer_reviews.text: It does not look like the picture that I saw
customer_reviews.author: Roop

customer_reviews.title: Love my jade stone for Gua Sha treatments.
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my Gua Sha sessions. I am a massage therapist and this is my go to for Gua Sha. Just be careful. Will break if dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Large size feels more secure in habd
customer_reviews.text: Best size Gua Sha tool I’ve tried so far. It feels more secure in your hand because of its larger size. Very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Harrison Joling

customer_reviews.title: Way too thick
customer_reviews.text: 1st time quality was good and thin but the 2nd one I got is way thicker and poor quality. It's clunky and does not gua sha my face the way the 1st one did. Don't order unless you want to gamble on getting a really bad gua sha or possibly an okay one.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Glad to own this
customer_reviews.text: I like this and happy I made this purchase. A tad thinner than depicted in photo but you don't press down with exertion so should hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Books McGulligan

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: It looks and feels as expected. In order to see results, you have to be very consistent. I have noticed, it does take down the puffiness. I do it morning and night. So far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: jq

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this working at all, but it’s absolutely incredible! Pamper yourself and work on those sore muscles with this incredible wonder!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Woll

customer_reviews.title: An everything body tool.
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this great for your face but I use it when I have migraines too and it relieves the tension. I use this for sore muscles everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: FrancesGreco

customer_reviews.title: A great little tool for plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shape and thin for use anywhere. My plantar fasciitis is being helped with this tool. I use this on myself and on my clients. They can feel a difference when I use this to loosen tight restriction (very carefully!) in the fascia and circulation is immediate.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: love this piece
customer_reviews.text: I only wanted one tool, not a bunch, and this is the one I can use for everything. all over the face and certain body parts with aches and pains. it's perfect. great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Evan K

customer_reviews.title: I use this more than I thought I would
customer_reviews.text: Love this for massaging my face, neck and body. I have actually seen improvements on my "tech neck." I also notice my skin is firmier and less puffy after using- it's a very effective lymphatic drainage massage tool. Also a great neck/back massage tool. I use this along with whatever oil I have on hand. Great way to relax and take a little me time. Definetly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great GuaSha tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool, the contours are very helpful to use it all over my face and neck. It makes my face feel brighter with every use. Glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RBPrime

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Gua Sha tool - Great starter tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great over all Gua Sha tool. The various curves allow it to be used in many different locations. This tool has been extremely versatile. I have even used the tips on acupressure points. The customer service was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Craftsonwheels

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just getting to know about Gua Sha and this tool is very easy to use and feels great on my skin. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Martine Lille

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really can tell a difference by using this every day!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It has great quality. It was recommended to me by my Acupuncturist/RN. I haven’t used it yet however, I will in the next couple of days. I’m sure it works too because it was recommended by her.
customer_reviews.author: jpay

customer_reviews.title: Need a print book not ebook
customer_reviews.text: Would love to have a print book. Don’t have anyway to print it and is very long to read on line. Have used it but have no idea if I’m using it correctly
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Ashby

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Works so amazing for my planters fasciitis!!!! Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product
customer_reviews.text: Whitish color. Has a heavy feel. Not a bad product. I often use a smaller, thinner one, but wanted to try this so I ordered it. No regrets, just wish it came with a protected drawstring pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Magar

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Its fabulous! Love using it with a serum on my face it helps lifts the face and massage the facial muscles as you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Product as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my new Gua Sha. I was grateful for the instructions as it did explain that the Gua Sha could have some black specks that are a normal part of the jade as when I first opened mine I thought the black specks were flaws. It feels great on my skin and is a very relaxing part of my nightly facial routine.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Root

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE THE BEST! My physical therapist suggested these for my arthritic hands, and they are fantastic! I love them so much I now have three; one for my purse, one for downstairs in the TV room, and one for upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Series Fan

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. It's light colored jade but not a biggie to me. It's smooth and thick. Great piece.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn's time

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Guasha tool
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite guasha told, it's shape makes it great for all areas I've used it on, it's smooth, easy to hold, and is very effective in creating the "Sha". The Jade is also just plain lovely, so it's wonderful to look at and work with. Very good quality, very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne H.

customer_reviews.title: I even like their silly Heart Can Feel motto
customer_reviews.text: Not much reach, but really can dig deep into trigger points and scar tissue knots. Be careful not to drop as can be broken with a well placed drop onto hard flooring. I can use it on my neck while I'm driving or deep into my handstrings while lying down. Reasonable cost, less abrasive than metal on the skin. I even like their silly Heart Can Feel motto.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Beuttel

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: I like this Gua Sha Scraping Massage Tool for its high quality. The tool I received is very smooth and nice to handle, without any defects and very beautiful. This is the nicest Gua Sha I ever used. The delivery was exceptionally fast. Great transaction. Highly recommended. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ewa Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough but worked while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Broken after dropping but worked good until it cracked when dropped on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: They're all different qualities
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one. One side was chipped so I ordered a replacent. Got charged for both. The first could rip through your skin. Contact me tonreselve the matter
customer_reviews.author: Rocio A.

customer_reviews.title: Eleminates negative energy
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase and super useful. Instead of spending 30 every week on chiropractor who did the same thing now I can have someone else do it when I want for free. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: yup
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to give as a gift. Overall, every body like them. Easy to use and feels good on skin.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and hold.
customer_reviews.text: It’s good for my hand the pain is better then before .
customer_reviews.author: Alia

customer_reviews.title: Feels really nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality. Feels nice on the skin......it is a routine that I have to start using everyday, but I love the feel "
customer_reviews.author: Mellifluous

customer_reviews.title: Helping with Plantar Faciitis
customer_reviews.text: Went to my chiro and was relieved when she used the Jade stone to work over the PF area. I was impressed the next morning when I was without discomfort. She gave em a link to the product and I've been using it for 2 weeks now - this really helps. Still get "flares" but I can better manage the situation. High quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: The thicker version is great!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend the thicker version, it makes handling it way easier, and you still have enough of an edge to get precise on the massage points
customer_reviews.author: H Miller

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: Cute and I love the neat leaflet it comes with with tips Works well so far !
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sjoblom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stones
customer_reviews.text: Good quality stones, still getting used to it and have not yet seen the full results. But love and worth it!
customer_reviews.author: YK

customer_reviews.title: Helping cure my Plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Scraping tool. I'm using it for my plantar fasciitis and so far it is helping break up the scar tissue.
customer_reviews.author: Music and Life

customer_reviews.title: I like it.  It's a useful tool.
customer_reviews.text: I do like this scraper but I chipped it right away. It does need a good case besides what it is in. Too hard to use that. I got a refund for the chip but I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Danalynn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Easy to hold and use. Smooth and works well.
customer_reviews.author: KyHappyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shape for general gua sha self-treatment. It works well as gua sha scraping tool as well as simple acupressure. Fast shipping. Very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: The jade gua sha scraping tool is very nice! Almost exactly as shown in the picture except for the shade of green! I like the feel of it in my hand when I use it. It is real stone not plastic. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: give it time.
customer_reviews.text: love it! i use it twice daily and impressed with the modest gains made daily...
customer_reviews.author: totally at peace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very helpful in relieving stressed areas as in hypertonic muscles, scar tissue, enhancing blood flow while breaking up adhesions...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s a perfect tool to use if you have a bit of a chubby face. My face was a bit chubby for my likings and my cheekbone were hidden. And this product helped me get my cheekbones back and it is a great way to relax and help the products you apply at night absorb into your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Good but easily shatters
customer_reviews.text: Lasted for a few months, but easily shattered after falling on wood flooring. Not very high quality jade product because it is cut so thin
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Jade Gua Sha Scraping Massage Tool for Facial Skincare
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in a reasonable amount of time and was the product ordered.
customer_reviews.author: R.K.

customer_reviews.title: A total quality experience
customer_reviews.text: So often when we buy online there is always a concern about quality and how functional a product is going to be. I was really pleased with the quality of both the product packaging as well as the packaging for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H Hawken

customer_reviews.title: not too pleased
customer_reviews.text: mine has a very tiny chip in it. fortunately, i don't feel it when i use it.
customer_reviews.author: grammybird

customer_reviews.title: Simple but effective
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. Great after putting on serums or moisturizers. Stimulates my skin and gives ir a lift and tightening effect
customer_reviews.author: Mario E.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Use it for chronic pain
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Use it for chronic pain. It feels kind of like what my acupuncturist does with "spooning" to release fascia and dissolve nots in muscles "
customer_reviews.author: D. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Try it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice packaging and very pretty product that feels so good.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the face
customer_reviews.text: The stone is almost clear very little color. Wish it was just a little bigger .
customer_reviews.author: SEE

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my massage therapist
customer_reviews.text: Works well to relieve sore and tight muscles. Easy to use, no special skills needed. Small, can easily be carried in pocket, purse, gym bag to use at the gym or on the job.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST KEPT SECRET EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have been in physical therapy for months to repair my knee after surgery. We are trying to loosen tight quads and break up scar tissue. When the PT broke out the Gua Sha stone, it was a real game changer. I am on the mend - finally.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Riffice

customer_reviews.title: Good for Achilles tendinitis massaging.
customer_reviews.text: I believed mine is a used one. It arrived very dull looking and rough edged. Also had scratches. So I cannot use it for facial. I bought it mainly for my Achilles tendinitis so it should do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ching

customer_reviews.title: Doctor recommended
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended b y our doctor. Does seem to activate blood flow to the area.
customer_reviews.author: James Naumann

customer_reviews.title: ... acupuncturist uses a gua sha tool on me with good results. So I thought I'd try one and ...
customer_reviews.text: My acupuncturist uses a gua sha tool on me with good results. So I thought I'd try one and I'm not disappointed. It was delivered promptly, was in good condition, and the download instruction book was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: highlandbound

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to scraping during PT while combating a nasty case of plantar fasciitis. It was so effective that I bought my own tool and use it on a regular basis. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Nice broad shape
customer_reviews.text: Unusual to find this nice tool. Well shaped and crafted.
customer_reviews.author: David Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Piece of stone
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know why I bought this, it’s just a piece of shining stone.
customer_reviews.author: Kamesh Kishanth

customer_reviews.title: Good Tool but not GREEN Jade.
customer_reviews.text: It's not GREEN Jade and is very near translucent, not anywhere near what is pictured in the sales photo. It would be very helpful to customers to see exactly what they'll be getting. This is the second one I bought from the company and this one is thinner than the first one I bought, and more fragile. So be careful you don't drop it on a hard surface. That being said it feels very comfortable in my hand, it's cool - sleek - silky - smooth - well crafted and does the job. The E-Book is much better than the first one I was sent.
customer_reviews.author: Dove

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, I am an athlete and my trainer uses the plastic version on our legs and so I wanted to get my own real jade one. My legs feel great the next day because I can get the littlest knots out with the gua sha.
customer_reviews.author: Tiera

customer_reviews.title: A must in my home and purse
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these throughout my home and in my purse Love how it helps to use it
customer_reviews.author: M. Cook
